fields.address: 1st Floor, Belapur Bhavan, C.B.D., Navi Mumbai - 400 614
fields.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-7, New Link Road, Malad (W)
fields.subject: Regarding payment of road excavation charges.
fields.reference_2: Estimate submitted by the Executive Engineer, Turbhe on 23/9/25.
fields.body_summary: This is to inform that M/s. Bharti Airtel Limited has proposed excavation for a total of 812 m. using the open trenching method from South Central Road (near HP Petrol pump) to Manish Export in Nerul division. Accordingly, as per the government resolution and the estimate provided by the Executive Engineer for the asphalt road excavation, you are required to deposit the following excavation charges in the Municipal Corporation.
fields.label: Total
fields.total_amount_in_words: One Crore Fifty-Eight Lakh Thirty-One Thousand Two Hundred Forty-One Only
fields.payment_instructions: As per the above, a demand draft (D.D.) for the total amount of Rs 1,58,31,241/- (Re-establishment charges Rs 1,23,86,436/-, Supervision charges Rs 18,57,965/-, Security deposit Rs 14,24,440/-, and Ground rent Rs 1,62,400/-) should be prepared and submitted to the accounts department of Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation. A copy of the said receipt should be submitted to this office. Also, an agreement regarding the excavation should be submitted. Only after that, the process of giving permission for road cutting will be carried out. Please note this. Please note that GST will be payable on the above amount as per Notification No. 03/2018 Central Tax (Rate) dated January 25, 2018. Your organization will be responsible for paying the GST.
fields.surface: New Asphalt Surface / Cable through duct / Number of ducts 3 / New Asphalt Surface (Open Trench Method) / Total Sq.M.
